poem:
### Illusion of Green

Copenhagen's charm,  
a whisper of green, deceives—  
amidst concrete dreams,  
Lynetteholmen rises,  
an island of artifice.  
In the shadows of progress,  
unity and nature  
stretch their roots anew,  
but beneath the façade,  
the city sighs—  
unseen,  
unheard,  
a restless soul in search  
of truth.
